Project.name: AutoGuard
Project.scenes: Setup 2,Setup 4,Hint Password,Setup 3,Setup 5,Hint Quiet,About,Home,Hint VPN as VPN,Hint Type,Hint Port,Settings,No AdGuard,Setup 1

TextElement.Str: This screen isn't done yet, bc app in beta and blah blah idk does it even work on other devices lol

AdGuard automation password
Allows this app to control proxy settings of AdGuard. You can find it in "Settings" → "General" → "Advanced" → "Automation". Copy the password and paste here

Inbound proxy port
You need to enable the inbound proxy server in your VPN app and enter the server port here.
When you connect to the VPN, the proxy will be started and AdGuard will filter its traffic.

Quiet mode
Don't show pop-up messages (toasts) at the bottom of the screen when you connect to or disconnect from a proxy server.

Inbound proxy type
Enable the inbound proxy server in your VPN app and enter the server type here.
When you connect to the VPN, the proxy will be started and AdGuard will filter its traffic.

VPN app as VPN tunnel (root)
Instead of constantly checking the availability of port %PORT, this app will only be activated when you enable/disable the VPN on your device.
Useful only if your VPN app cannot work as proxy (only as VPN) but still supports inbound proxy.
If your VPN app is running in VPN mode, you'll need to set AdGuard to Automatic Proxy mode (requires root).

AdGuard isn't installed
This app is designed to automate the actions of AdGuard for Android. You may have installed AdGuard Content Blocker from the Play Store, but this is a different app and it's not supported.
You can download AdGuard from the official website: https://adguard.com/adguard-android/overview.html

Hi!
This small app will help you integrate AdGuard with various VPN clients, so think of it as advanced AdGuard + AdGuard VPN Integrated mode.

Only those VPN apps are supported that can work in proxy mode (without creating a VPN tunnel on your device). It usually supported by advanced VPN clients:
Hiddify, Shadowsocks, Nekobox, husi, Exclave, v2rayNG, Karing, Clash, WG Tunnel, Psiphon, Orbot, InviZible Pro, ByeByeDPI and many more.

Permissions
To ensure that the app works properly, please grant permissions in the settings and add it to the AdGuard filtering exclusions.

Password
Allows this app to control the proxy settings of AdGuard. Go to "Settings" → "General" → "Advanced" → "Automation". Enable it, copy the password and paste here.

Proxy
Open your VPN app, enable inbound SOCKS(4/5) or HTTP(S) proxy and enter its type and port here.

Action.label: Ping and store info to CODE1
Ping again and store info to CODE2
Set new type number for value restoring
Assign PASS value to field if PASS isn't empty
Assign PORT value to field if PORT isn't empty
Set PORT after setup if empty
If enabled, don't check proxy state

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%app_apk APK File The full path to the APK of the app. You can use the Copy File action to copy it somewhere and rename it if you like.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%app_uid APK File The kernel user-ID that has been assigned to this application; currently this is not a unique ID</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%app_activity_classes() Activity Classes The class names of all the activities that true if exported, false if not</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%app_activity_labels() Activity Labels The name of all the activities that this app has</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%app_enabled Enabled true if app is enabled, false if not</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%app_install_time First Install Time Time in seconds since EPOCH that app was installed this app. Can be used to check if app was installed from Google Play.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%app_is_default_launcher Is Default Launcher true if the app is the current EPOCH that app was last updated</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%app_min_sdk Minimum SDK Minimum SDK version for the app.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES14>%app_name Name Name of the
